    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arcane Sense](/Feats.aspx?ID=754) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 258 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

Your study of magic allows you to instinctively sense its presence. You can cast 1st-level [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) at will as an arcane innate spell. If you’re a master in Arcana, the spell is heightened to 3rd level; if you’re legendary, it is heightened to 4th level.

<title level="2">Arcane Sense leads to...</title>
[Eye of the Arclords](/Feats.aspx?ID=870)
